author: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: I swear, by my life and my love of it, that I will never live for the sake of another man, nor ask another man to live for mine.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: The smallest minority on earth is the individual. Those who deny individual rights cannot claim to be defenders of minorities.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Contradictions do not exist.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Whenever you think you are facing a contradiction, check your premises. You will find that one of them is wrong.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: There are two sides to every issue: one side is right and the other is wrong, but the middle is always evil.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.

author: Ayn Rand
quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I am tired of running. Tired of you threatening my friends. I will run no more.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I deny you. You have no power over me, and I will not kneel to you, alive or dead.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I didn't do it on purpose. It just happened. I don't want to channel the Power. I won't ever do it again. I swear it.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: That's right! The Dragon's banner! Moiraine wants me to be a puppet on Tar Valon strings, a false Dragon for the Aes Sedai.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: She's going to push it down my throat whatever I want. But-I-will-not-be-used!

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: Duty. Death is lighter than a feather, duty heavier than a mountain. That's what they say in Shienar.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: The Dark One is stirring. The Last Battle is coming.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: And the Dragon Reborn has to face the Dark One in the Last Battle, or the Shadow will cover everything. The Wheel of Time broken.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: There's only me. I have the duty, because there isn't anybody else, now is there?

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: By the right of blood, I ask leave to enter Rhuidean, for the honor of our ancestors and the memory of what was.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I... do not like to see a woman die. I hate it, Sulin. It curdles me up inside. I could not kill a woman if my life hung on it.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I said you would be on an equal footing with the Tower emissaries, and for bringing nine, you will be.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: They are on their knees, Aes Sedai. Kneel!

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: You were wrong, Cadsuane. He's real. I'm certain of it. I know he is.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I don't have time for tears, either, Min.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: Sometimes, the hounds catch the wolf and wish they hadn't. Sometimes, he turns on them, or waits in ambush. But first, the wolf has to run.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: With this, you can touch the greatest sa'angreal ever made for a woman.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: It's buried on Tremalking, I understand, but that doesn't matter. With this one, I can touch its male twin.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I hope they're enough to cleanse the male half of the Source.

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: It has to end!

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: I don't need a war with the White Tower, and you bloody Asha'man bloody well won't give me a war with the White Tower!

author: Rand al'Thor
quote: Do I make myself understood?
